result.execSummary:
The defendant Jerico Bear Norton was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse Assessments], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Defendant Jerico Bear Norton in court with attorney Obi Uzowulu.  Carolyn Hillery Delery appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Darlene Shue.
The State is in compliance with Ch. 950. The State files amended information. Defense acknowledges receipt/waives reading of same
Upon pl to 15CF1454, Ct 1 & 2. The State recommends 12 mos prob; 30 days RCJ/STAYED. 15CF1663, pl to Ct 1 and Ct 2 is DRI. The State recommends CFTS.
P-G to all counts as above
COP filed, rights given
the deft waives right to JT
the State relies on comp for FB - defense stiuplates to same
finding of guilt

BTC: guilty as above. 15CF1454 -  sent w/held - 1 yr prob
                                     15CF1663 - 77 days RCJ/full CFTS, costs including dom abuse surcharge, DNA costs = may be paid during the term of probation. FTP =  1 day RCJ for every $50 owed

Conditions:
Ct 1 - 30 days RCJ/STAYED
costs on Ct 1 only
all costs are waived on Ct 1
DNA sample & costs
any counseling deemed approp by agent; specifically anger management counseling and vocational training
Must take all medications as prescribed
employment as deft is able/school
must obtain HS diploma

obey all rules and regulations
